entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Snow level 600 metres rising to 1000 metres near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero with risk of frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 1000 metres. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero with risk of frost. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 1100 metres. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
